name: Freskazavr Prototype
description:
Hello,

We are Freskazavr indie dev team and this is our beat-em-up power fantasy early game build with no name.

It may have bugs and things working incorrect, because it's the prototype.

This build was urgently made as a part of the game designer portfolio. The major goal is to show the basic fighting mechanic and it’s potential.

We hope you enjoy it.

Freskazavr team: 

          Sergey Nazarov — programming, animation, gamedesign; 

          Sonya Kocheeva — art, design (not included yet).
